name: AIInsightsPanel
title: AI Insights Panel

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Whether the insights are currently being generated

properties.name: error
properties.description: Error message to display if insights generation failed

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title text for the panel header

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Font Awesome icon class for the title

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.description: Maximum height for the content area with scroll

properties.name: showRefresh
properties.description: Whether to show the refresh button

properties.name: showExport
properties.description: Whether to show the export to markdown button

properties.name: showCopy
properties.description: Whether to show the copy to clipboard button

properties.name: position
properties.description: Position of the panel ('top' or 'bottom') affects margin

properties.name: defaultCollapsed
properties.description: Whether the panel starts in collapsed state

properties.name: onClose
properties.description: Optional callback when close button is clicked

properties.name: customButtons
properties.description: Array of custom button configurations to add to the button bar

events.name: onToggleCollapse
events.description: Fired when the panel is collapsed or expanded

events.name: onCopy
events.description: Fired when content is copied to clipboard

events.name: onExport
events.description: Fired when content is exported as markdown
